entry.title: dagmawibabi/ScholArxiv
entry.summary:
ScholArxiv is an open-source aesthetic and minimal app that allows users to search, read, bookmark, share, download and view summaries of academic papers from the arXiv repository.

ScholArxiv


ScholArxiv is an open-source, aesthetic and minimal app that allows users to search, read, bookmark, share, download and view summaries of academic papers from the arXiv repository. Now you can configure your Gemini API key and converse with AI to expand and dive deeper into the papers you're exploring.

‚¨áÔ∏è Download Now for the Latest Version. Enjoy!

üí∞ Features

‚ú® AI Chat: Use AI Chat to delve deeper and understand papers.

üìö Read Papers: Read entire papers in detail within the app.

üîñ Bookmarks: Save your favorite papers for quick access.

üìù Summaries: View and listen to brief paper summaries.

üîé Search Papers: Search for papers using keywords, titles, authors and abstract. If no keyword is provided the app suggests random popular papers.

‚¨áÔ∏è Download and Share: Download papers for offline reading or you can share document links to others.

‚òÄÔ∏è Themes: There are three available themes to make browsing and discovering papers comfortable. Light mode, dark mode and mixed mode.

Support, Shoutouts, Guides, Articles

  • Featured in How To Men's Best Android Apps (September 2024) Video

  • Featured in InsTech's 1st Edition magazine and YouTube Video

  • InnoVirtuoso's wrote a complete explainer article about ScholArxiv

  • And Many More! THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR THE SUPPORT!

Contribution

You can help support the project in three ways. ‚ú®

  1. By Contributing
    • Fork this repo
    • Add your new changes
    • Comment well
    • Open a PR
  2. By Starring the Repo
  3. By Sharing this Project to your friends and community

You can use the issues tab to get inspiration.

More Illustrations
